cyb70289 commented on code in PR #13569:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13569#discussion_r918471260


##########
cpp/src/arrow/array/array_binary.cc:
##########
@@ -26,6 +26,7 @@
 #include "arrow/type_traits.h"
 #include "arrow/util/checked_cast.h"
 #include "arrow/util/logging.h"
+#include "arrow/util/utf8.h"

Review Comment:
   Is this header necessary? Looks this file calls `internal::ValidateUTF8`, not `util::ValidateUTF8`.

cyb70289 commented on PR #13569:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13569#issuecomment-1181217830

pitrou commented on code in PR #13569:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13569#discussion_r918624680


##########
cpp/src/arrow/array/array_binary.cc:
##########
@@ -26,6 +26,7 @@
 #include "arrow/type_traits.h"
 #include "arrow/util/checked_cast.h"
 #include "arrow/util/logging.h"
+#include "arrow/util/utf8.h"

Review Comment:
   `ValidateUTF8` is part of `utf8.h`, the inlined version is named `ValidateUTF8Inline`.

fields.description: {{arrow/util/utf8.h}} exposes both extern functions and inlined functions, the latter being dependent on xsimd. For consumption of the extern utilities from third-party code, we should split it in two so that xsimd does not have to be present when building.
fields.summary: [C++] Split utf8.h to avoid exposing xsimd dependency to the outside
